content:
#27082 gives exists_le_minimal lemmas for Set.IsPWO. I resolved a suggestion on namespace last month and it is untouched since then.
#27639 is a small PR gives OrderedSub to LinearOrder + CanonicallyOrderedAdd. It blocks #27341.
Glad to say #27342, my first PR for semilinear sets, is ready for review now.
The second PR #27414 is ready for review now. After refactoring, it still contains ~600 lines (half are private definitions and theorems)... I hope it's still reviewable :slight_smile:
